thread.title: It's OK, Emma Watson Finds The Beast Hot Too
thread.title_full: It's OK, Emma Watson Finds The Beast Hot Too

author: Jenna Guillaume
title: It's OK, Emma Watson Finds The Beast Hot Too
text:
ID: 10694570 2. Emma Watson, a.k.a. Belle herself, says she actually prefers the Beast. View this image › 
Disney ID: 10694623 3. In an interview with Yahoo News , she admitted to feeling sad when the prince replaces the Beast. View this image › 
uk.news.yahoo.com ID: 10694654 4. Guess she’s really into hairy guys. View this image › 
uk.news.yahoo.com ID: 10694653 5. Especially because she also admitted to having a bit of a crush on another famous beast… View this image › 
Disney ID: 10694667 6. Yep, Aslan from The Chronicles of Narnia . View this image › 
uk.news.yahoo.com ID: 10694671 7. It’s OK Emma, we’ve all been there. View this image › 
uk.news.yahoo.com ID: 10694705 8. I mean, maybe not with Aslan, but have you SEEN Simba? View this image › 
Disney ID: 10694716 9. Watch Emma’s full confession below. View this embed › 
ID: 10694603 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
  More News About Emma Watson Jenna Guillaume is Editor-at-Large for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
